item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 6, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Hiding elements that require JavaScript without JavaScript (20 points | 7 comments)

23. Microsoft's Quake 2 AI experiment sparks negative reactions (20 points | 20 comments)
24. The Llama 4 herd (1153 points | 581 comments)

29. North America Is Dripping from Below, Geoscientists Discover (129 points | 37 comments)
